full_transcript: The power of Lumina is in its predictive accuracy. While standard analytics are around 68 percent accurate, our Trend-Pulse engine reaches 92 percent accuracy for retail demand. We help you move from reacting to what happened yesterday to predicting what will happen in six months.

segments.text: The power of Lumina is in its predictive accuracy. Standard analytics just don't cut it anymore.
segments.speaker: Sales Rep

segments.text: Our Trend-Pulse engine reaches 92 percent accuracy for retail demand forecasting.
segments.speaker: Sales Rep

segments.text: We help you move from reacting to yesterday to predicting six months into the future.
segments.speaker: Sales Rep
